items.fromString:
h1. Why

As a user, I want to be able to request a new integration from the Laika Objects and Concierge (Hey Laika\!) pages.

h1. AC

# Add an "Add Integration" button to the header of Laika Objects page‚Ä®
   1.1 When clicked, an "Add Integration: \[LAIKA OBJECT TYPE]" should appear, depending on the Laika Object type that is currently selected. 
      a. In the modal, all the available integrations for that specific Laika Object type (devices, background check, cloud, etc.) should be displayed in a column. Each available integration should have a "Configure" button that, when clicked, redirects the user to the integration details page for that integration and begins the wizard to make a connection account for that integration.
      b. At the bottom of the modal, there should be a "Request Integration" button and an "Ok" button. The former should open the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)]. The latter button should close the modal.
      c. The modal should scroll if more than 4 integrations are available for a given Laika Object type.

 

2.    Add a "Request Integration" button to the the Concierge (Hey Laika\!) paged \[DESIGN NEEDED]
       2.1 When clicked, the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)] should be opened.
        2.2 A section for privacy policy, MSA, and DPA should be added \[FURTHER DESCRIPTION & DESIGN NEEDED]
items.toString:
h1. Why

As a user, I want to be able to request a new integration from the Laika Objects and Concierge (Hey Laika\!) pages.

h1. AC

# Add an "Add Integration" button to the header of Laika Objects page‚Ä®
   1.1 When clicked, an "Add Integration: \[LAIKA OBJECT TYPE]" should appear, depending on the Laika Object type that is currently selected. 
      a. In the modal, all the available integrations for that specific Laika Object type (devices, background check, cloud, etc.) should be displayed in a column. Each available integration should have a "Configure" button that, when clicked, redirects the user to the integration details page for that integration and begins the wizard to make a connection account for that integration.
      b. At the bottom of the modal, there should be a "Request Integration" link and a "Close" button. The former should open the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)]. The latter button should close the modal.
      c. The modal should scroll if more than 5 integrations are available for a given Laika Object type.

 

2.    Add a "Request Integration" button to the the Concierge (Hey Laika\!) paged \[DESIGN NEEDED]
       2.1 When clicked, the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)] should be opened.
        2.2 A section for privacy policy, MSA, and DPA should be added \[FURTHER DESCRIPTION & DESIGN NEEDED]

items.fromString:
h1. Why

As a user, I want to be able to request a new integration from the Laika Objects and Concierge (Hey Laika!) pages.

h1. AC

* Add an "Add Integration" button to the header of Laika Objects page‚Ä®
   1. When clicked, an "Add Integration: [LAIKA OBJECT TYPE]" should appear, depending on the Laika Object type that is currently selected. 
      a. In the modal, all the available integrations for that specific Laika Object type (devices, background check, cloud, etc.) should be displayed in a column. Each available integration should have a "Configure" button that, when clicked, redirects the user to the integration details page for that integration and begins the wizard to make a connection account for that integration.
      b. At the bottom of the modal, there should be a "Request Integration" button and an "Ok" button. The former should open the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket AB-824 (https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824). The latter button should close the modal.
      c. The modal should scroll if more than 4 integrations are available for a given Laika Object type.
 
* Add a "Request Integration" button to the the Concierge (Hey Laika!) paged [DESIGN NEEDED]
   1. When clicked, the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket AB-824 (https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824) should be opened.
    2. A section for privacy policy, MSA, and DPA should be added [FURTHER DESCRIPTION & DESIGN NEEDED]
When clicked (from any of the above three sources), the button should open the concierge request modal.

As a user, I want to be able to request a new integration from the Laika Objects and Concierge (Hey Laika\!) pages.

h1. AC

# Add an "Add Integration" button to the header of Laika Objects page‚Ä®

      a. In the modal, all the available integrations for that specific Laika Object type (devices, background check, cloud, etc.) should be displayed in a column. Each available integration should have a "Configure" button that, when clicked, redirects the user to the integration details page for that integration and begins the wizard to make a connection account for that integration.
      b. At the bottom of the modal, there should be a "Request Integration" button and an "Ok" button. The former should open the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)]. The latter button should close the modal.
      c. The modal should scroll if more than 4 integrations are available for a given Laika Object type.

 

2.    Add a "Request Integration" button to the the Concierge (Hey Laika\!) paged \[DESIGN NEEDED]
       2.1 When clicked, the same Request New Integration modal that was built for ticket [AB-824] ([https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)|https://heylaika.atlassian.net/browse/AB-824)] should be opened.
        2.2 A section for privacy policy, MSA, and DPA should be added \[FURTHER DESCRIPTION & DESIGN NEEDED]
This issue is supported by AB-824

fields.description:
When an already successful created integration name is edited, the update name is not reflected in the LO section

*Steps:*
1. Go to https://staging.heylaika.com/integrations
2. Create a successful integration and leave the default name
3. Wait for the connection to display the green checkmark
4. Edit the recently created integration and change its name
5. Go to Company > Objects > Account

*Expected Result:*
The Connection Name reflects the integration with the updated name

*Actual Result*
The Connection Name maintains the default name for updated integration
fields.summary: Integration name not updated on LO
